I've dealt with Koshoyama books several times and found them
to be very helpful, reliable and inexpensive relative to other
book dealers. 

You might also try Sibata. His website is in Japanese only,
but he reads/speaks English and will answer inquiries about
books, etc. on his site. Also reasonable prices and shipping IMHO>

http://www.tokensibata.co.jp/

Rich S
